entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023
